basics.name: Yash Narwal
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: Iâ€™m a full stack web developer who can build apps from the ground up. I've worked mostly at small companies so I am use to wearing many hats. I am a very product focussed developer who priotizes user feedback first and foremost. I'm generally very flexible when investigating new roles.

references.reference: Yash is a talented, dynamic and a hard working individual. I had the opportunity of collaborating with him while working on a website project. Yash with his solid experience in Ruby On Rails lead the group in the application design and development phase. He is exhaustive and creative with his approach and always comes up with new out of the box ideas. I would recommend Yash to anyone has he is a delight to work with
references.name: Arjun Kapoor, Consultant at Deloitte Australia.
